Verses: 2 manupuththirane, Kaattilirukkira Sedigalukkul Matra Ellaa Sedikodigalaippaarkkilum Dhraatchachchedikku Menmai Enna?
3 yaadhoru Velaiseyya Adhile Oru Kattai Edukkappadumo? Yaadhoru Thattumuttaith Thookkivaikkumpadi Oru Mulaiyai Adhinaal Seyvaargalo?
4 idho, Adhu Akkinikku Iraiyaaga Eriyappadum; Adhin Irandu Munaigalaiyum Akkini Eriththuppodum; Adhin Naduththundum Vendhupom; Adhu Endha Velaikkaavadhu Udhavumo?
5 idho, Adhu Vegaadhirukkumpodhe Oru Velaikkum Udhavaadhirukka, Akkini Adhai Eriththu, Adhu Vendhuponapinbu, Adhu Ini Oru Velaikku Udhavuvadheppadi?

6 aadhalaal, Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Kaattu Sedigalukkullirukkira Dhraatchachchediyai Naan Akkinikku Iraiyaaga Oppukkoduththadhupola, Erusalemin Kudigalaiyum Appadiye Oppukkoduththu,

7 en Mugaththai Avargalukku Virodhamaagath Thiruppuven; Avargal Oru Akkiniyilirundhu Neengith Thappinaalum, Vere Akkini Avargalai Patchikkum; Appadiye Naan En Mugaththai Avargalukku Virodhamaaith Thiruppumpodhu, Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolveergal.
8 avargal Dhrogampanninapadiyinaal, Naan Dhesaththaip Paazhaaip Pogappannuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endraar.
